title: Shocking! Three old women administered anti-rabies vaccine instead of COVID-19 in UP's Shamli, probe ordered
description: In a shocking incident, three senior citizens were administered with anti-rabies vaccine rather than the COVID-19 vaccine in Uttar Pradesh’s Shamli.

title: Taking a Flight Amid Second Wave of COVID-19? Check State-wise Restrictions, Rules on Testing And Quarantine Here
description: Those arriving in Delhi from COVID-hit states like Maharashtra, Karnataka might have to undergo random testing.

title: SII expected to supply jabs promised to COVAX despite demand spike in India
description: The Oxford University-AstraZeneca covid-19 vaccine manufactured by SII, and available in India under brand name Covishield, is part of the ongoing nationwide covid-19 vaccination programme

title: 'Don't Increase Workload': 'Yamraj' In UP Urges People To Wear Masks
description: A local artist in Uttar Pradesh's Moradabad has put his art to best use by spreading awareness about the deadly coronavirus. Dressed as the Hindu God of Death, Yamraj, the man went around many localites on Friday urging everyone to wear a face mask.

title: Scientists predict second COVID wave to peak between April 15-20
description: Scientists are now working on a mathematical model to examine the COVID-19 spread and have predicted that the current second wave will peak somewhere between April 15-20 and then see a decline

title: Covid 19 cases: These states and cities enforce night curfew, partial lockdown and other stricter restrictions
description: Covid 19 restrictions in your city: Covid 19 infections have been hitting fresh highs on daily basis. Maharashtra continues to lead the the chart in terms of number of coronavirus being recorded.

title: Migrant labourers leave Mumbai in packed trains fearing lockdown
description: Speaking to ANI, a migrant worker who was travelling in an Uttar Pradesh bound train said, "This train will go to Gorakhpur. We're leaving the city because Covid-19 cases are rising here."

title: As Covid-19 cases rise in India, more states impose curbs
description: Through the week, weekend lockdowns have been imposed in parts of Maharashtra and Chhattisgarh, while Delhi, Punjab, major cities in Gujarat and urban areas of Rajasthan have announced night curfews.

title: COVID-19: Night curfew imposed in four Uttar Pradesh districts
description: Travellers going to the airport, railway stations and bus stands will be allowed movement during the night if they show valid travel tickets, the orders stated

title: Assembly elections amid COVID-19: ‘Unsafe’ EVMs, Mamata Banerjee’s grit and rising violence

title: Delhi Covid: Capital records highest 1-day spike this year with 7,000 new cases

title: Migrants workers start fleeing cities as 2nd Covid-19 wave grips India - La Prensa Latina Media
description: New Delhi, Apr 8 (efe-epa).- India on Thursday added a record-high of more than 126,000 new Covid-19 cases as several states announced restrictions, causing hundreds of migrant laborers to flee cities over fears of job losses. The federal health ministry said 126,789 new patients tested positive for Covid-19 in the last 24 hours from Wednesday …

title: Covid-19 vaccine war erupts between Centre and Maharashtra
description: A major vaccine war seems to have broken out between the Centre and the Maha Vikas Aghadi government of Maharashtra – which are at loggerheads for over 15 months on multiple issues. A day after Union Health and Family Welfare Minister Dr Harsh Vardhan launched a blistering attack accusing the Maharashtra government of bogging down India’s efforts in fighting the Covid-19 pandemic, the Uddhav Thackeray-led MVA government reiterated its demand for additional vaccine stock and rapid supply and compared its position with other states including those ruled by the BJP.

title: Uttar Pradesh class 10, 12 exam new datesheet announced
description: Uttar Pradesh Class 10 and Class 12 board exams will now be conducted on a new schedule released by the board. Scroll down to check the datesheet.

title: COVID-19: UP reports 8,490 new cases, imposes night curfew in many districts

title: Ten states showing upward trajectory of daily new Covid-19 cases

title: Covid surge continues in Uttar Pradesh; night curfew in Lucknow
description: In a bid to effectively control the pandemic infection in the district, the Lucknow district administration said that all educational institutitions, barring medical, nursing and para-medical institutes, would remain closed till April 15. Night curfew will be imposed under the Lucknow Municipal Corporation from Thursday till April 16, the official said, as the coronavirus cases continue to surge.

title: Uttar Pradesh sees 2,967 new coronavirus cases, reports 16 deaths

title: Coronavirus Updates | Uttar Pradesh reports 2,967 new cases, 16 deaths
description: Coronavirus Updates: India on Friday recorded 81,466 fresh Covid-19 cases in the biggest spike in six months. Actor Alia Bhatt became the latest celebrity to test positive coronavirus. Alia Bhatt, who is shooting a film with director Sanjay Leela Bhansali had earlier tested negative for Covid-19 when Bhansali and her boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor contracted the disease. On Thursday, India launched a vaccination drive for those above 45 years. Centre has asked the state governments to make necessary arrangements for the vaccination drive. Meanwhile, as Mumbai reported a sharp increase of over 8,600 cases, the city mayor hinted at bringing some restrictions from April 2.
